https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5IFAqx2QetKbh8vfRfsyQxhTtII.jpg Tim is a taxi driver who divides what is left over from his irregular hours between caring for his elderly father who suffers from Alzheimer and his boyfriend, Han. Tim has things under control, in his own way, however his quiet world is about to crumble. Blood, Rice and Tears
